### Bilingual Sentiment Analysis and Detoxification {#project1}

![](images/projects/detox.png){width=200px style="float: right; margin: 0 0 10px 10px;"}

**Overview**  
Developed an end-to-end NLP pipeline supporting English and Swahili for sentiment analysis, toxicity detection, and detoxification. Features both Rule-based and Agentic modes, leveraging LangChain and Hugging Face models.

### Biomedical Lay Summarization {#project2}

![](images/projects/biolay.png){width=200px style="float: right; margin: 0 0 10px 10px;"}

**Overview**  
Participated in the BioLaySumm 2025 shared task to generate layperson-friendly biomedical summaries from scientific abstracts. Leveraged pretrained language models fine-tuned for domain-specific summarization.
